Question: In the late 1970s, this person was cast as Wilbur, a main character in Werner Herzog's Fitzcarraldo.
Hints: In 2010, a retrospective exhibition of portraits of this person was presented at the festival Rencontres d'Arles, in France.
The catalogue of the exhibition is the first photo album of this person and shows his evolution over 50 years.
Other authors also attribute similar connotations to this person.
